title: Definite integral and composite accumulation f part - b

content.description: Let g be the piecewise-linear function defined on [-2π, 4π] whose graph is given above, and let \(f\left(x\right)=g\left(x\right)-\cos\left(\frac{x}{2}\right)\).
content.question: Find all x-values in the open interval(−2π, 4π) for which f has a critical point.

frqParts.text: Find all x-values in the open interval(−2π, 4π) for which f has a critical point.

topic.text: 5.2: Extreme Value Theorem, Global Versus Local Extrema, and Critical Points

skill.text: Skill 3.E: Provide reasons or rationales for solutions and conclusions.
